description: Square array read by antidiagonals: a(n,k)= sum of two positive regular n-polytopic numbers (i.e. a(n,k) = binomial(x,n)+ binomial(y,n) for some x,y>=n).
example: a(2,.)= 2,4,6,7,9,11,12,13,16..= sum of two positive triangular numbers=A051533; a(3,.)= 2,5,8,11,14,20,21,24,30,36,.. = sum of two positive tetrahedral numbers;2; 2,3; 2,4,4; 2,5,6,5; ...
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de)
